The appearance of severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) has caused unprecedented global disruption to health, economy, and social stability.
1 SARS-CoV-2 causes coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in which individuals can suffer from mild to severe symptoms once infected.
2 Global scientific communities are working together to fight the crisis caused by this pandemic. The initial efforts to combat this pandemic included identifying infected patients and ramping up clinical trials for repurposing existing drugs.
3 However, the development of effective vaccines to prevent SARS-CoV-2 infection is believed by many to be the most effective long-term solution.
